recipesJson.name: Nectarine Coconut Cream
recipesJson.author: Echodub
recipesJson.description:
This recipe needs to steep a dew days
---------------------------------------------

I like the combo of nectarine and apricot, together with some nice coconut cream it's a well rounded, slightly fruity mix
Adjust your sweetener level, i like it at 0.5%

reviews.text: Oh.. yum. I have to try this.
